tabs.title: Introduction
tabs.content:
"Torture the data until it confesses."                                                                                                                                                      

The amount of data an organisation receives is reaching  unprecedented levels. Now that we’ve data, all we need to know is how to decipher it to uncover the hidden patterns, correlations and find useful information to make better decisions. This is the event which tests your thinking pattern, decision making skills, team work, and how you handle data!

tabs.title: Format
tabs.content:
ROUND 1:

This round will test your basic thinking capacity and analysing skills. Basic aptitude questions and some streams of data where you’ll have to decipher it to find solutions to the given queries. 

ROUND 2:

This round will test how you think. You’ll be given data and will be asked to discuss it.

ROUND 3:

This round will test all of your skills(thinking capacity, communication skills, presentation and money making skills) You’ll have to form a business idea from the given sets of data.

tabs.title: Rules
tabs.content:
» This is a team event, with three members per team.

» You’ll be eliminated when you fail to exceed the expectations.

» The participants are requested to be formally dressed for Round 3.
